author: Staff Reporter
text:
Kattoor Police arrested Anushaya (45) of Ramanathapuram and Devi (43) of Narasimhanaickenpalayam on Saturday for alleged involvement in flesh trade at Ram Nagar in the city.

The police also rescued a 21-year-old woman from Managali in Bengaluru whom the women were using for the illegal activity.
title: Two held on charge of running flesh trade
